availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Algernon S. Brewer (Caldwell Co., Ky, farmhand)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, resident. Missouri native. Son of Lorenzo Brewer and Margaret Jane Spratt Brewer. Married to Susan Crow Brewer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1863. Resident in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmhand for John Spratt in Caldwell County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 397A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1786 - 1878, Film #000851644, p. 94.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546374, p. 19.
